text: Patient prescribed Metformin 1000mg instead of 100mg. Blood sugar levels elevated.
Missing vital signs from morning rounds. Patient status unclear.
Delayed CT scan order resulting in late diagnosis of appendicitis.
Nurse administered 50mg of Warfarin instead of 5mg. Patient experiencing severe bleeding.
No documentation of patient allergies in admission notes. Given penicillin despite allergy.
X-ray interpreted as normal, missing obvious lung mass. Cancer diagnosis delayed by 6 months.
Surgery started on wrong knee due to incorrect site marking.
Patient chart mixed up with another patient. Labs ordered for wrong person.
Insulin dose calculated incorrectly, resulting in severe hypoglycemia.
Missing follow-up documentation for post-operative care. Patient developed infection.
